note: GDP data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Per capita fossil energy consumption vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Fossil energy consumption is the sum of [primary energy](#dod:primaryenergy) from coal, oil and gas, measured in [megawatt-hours](#dod:watt-hours). Gross domestic product (GDP) per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
